Load Metadata

load_metadata.Rd

This function loads the current metadata avaliable from the Semantic Priming GitHub Group.

load_metadata(webaddress = "https://rb.gy/l82i9p")

Arguments

webaddress

The default value for webaddress is the current location of the metadata list.

Value

metadata

The metadata list of avaliable datasets

Examples


#Use the following to load the metadata:
metadata <- load_metadata()
head(metadata)
